espnscrapeR 0.2.1
  • Reference

Scrape ESPN FPI ratings for a specific season from ESPN's site

Source: R/scrape_fpi.R
scrape_fpi.Rd

Scrape ESPN FPI ratings for a specific season from ESPN's site

scrape_fpi(season = 2020, stat = "FPI")

Arguments

season

Either numeric or character
stat

One of 'FPI', 'EFF' or 'PROJ'

Value

Returns a tibble

Examples

# Get team offensive and defensive efficiency from 2020 season
scrape_fpi(2020, stat = "EFF")
#> Scraping EFF for 2020!
#> # A tibble: 32 x 11
#>    season team  w_l   eff_ove rnk_ove eff_off rnk_off eff_def rnk_def eff_spe
#>     <dbl> <chr> <chr>   <dbl>   <int>   <dbl>   <int>   <dbl>   <int>   <dbl>

#>  2   2020 Balt… 5-2-0    74.5       2    63.3      16    60.4       4    84.1
#>  3   2020 Pitt… 7-0-0    74.3       3    74.8       7    63.6       1    46.6
#>  4   2020 Gree… 6-2-0    70.4       4    85.8       1    29.5      25    63.5
#>  5   2020 Seat… 6-1-0    68.8       5    81.7       3    41.8      15    62.8
#>  6   2020 Tamp… 6-2-0    68.7       6    68.7      11    61.3       3    46.9
#>  7   2020 Indi… 5-2-0    67.6       7    63.8      15    59.1       5    59.4
#>  8   2020 Miam… 4-3-0    63         8    59.1      23    48.7      11    78  
#>  9   2020 Ariz… 5-2-0    61.7       9    64.8      13    52.2       7    51.1
